byline.original: By MARGARET ATKINSON-BARNES, ALEENA ISMAIL and SHANNON ORS

abstract: For our final Film Club of this school year, we’re suggesting a mix of films to watch and discuss, including short Times videos and longer feature films, all related to the theme of gender.

headline.main: Film Club | 6 Must-Watch Gender-Related Documentaries for Teens

snippet: For our final Film Club of this school year, we’re suggesting a mix of films to watch and discuss, including short Times videos and longer feature films, all related to the theme of gender.
